articles.title: Adani Enterprises makes first rupee bond market foray since Hindenburg - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The company raised 12.50 billion rupees (about $152 million) on Tuesday by selling three-year bonds with an annual coupon of 10%, data from the National Securities Depository Ltd showed on Wednesday.

articles.title: Senco Gold IPO: GMP rises after share allotment — listing date and more details - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Senco Gold shares are commanding a premium of Rs 135 in the grey market, according to market observers. If unlisted market trends are anything to go by, the company is expected to fetch a healthy premium.

articles.title: Pushing e-rupee payments using UPI infra on RBI's agenda - Economic Times
articles.description: The RBI had launched the e-rupee for retail transactions on a pilot basis on December 1, 2022. As of June, about 13 lakh users have downloaded the CBDC wallet and around 3 lakh merchants are accepting CBDC payments.
